data.name: list_slack_users
data.description:
Retrieve a list of all users in a Slack team.

This tool is used to obtain a comprehensive list of all users within a specific Slack team. It accesses user data, including possible email information if the appropriate scope is granted. The tool is ideal for scenarios where you need to manage or view team member information in Slack.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Use this to paginate through data collections. Set it to the `next_cursor` from a previous response's `response_metadata`.

parameters.name: include_user_locale
parameters.description: Set to `true` to include locale information for each user in the response.

parameters.name: maximum_number_of_users
parameters.description: The maximum number of user records to return. If not specified, all users may be returned.

parameters.name: encoded_team_id
parameters.description: Encoded team ID for listing users. Required if using an organization-level token; ignored with workspace-level tokens.
